name: Papa's Grave Quest
description:
Help Papa send ghouls, skeletons and the undead back into the ground with some tasty pizza pies.

  • Arrow keys / WASD to Drive
  • Spacebar to throw a tasty but dangerous pizza pie

Developed in 72 hours for Halloween 2020.

Almost certainly has bugs and problems, but it should be mostly playable.
Seems to play best in Chrome, Firefox lagged a bit while testing.
